title: Ghost of Tsushima vs. Days Gone - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.06.22
description:
Greg and Tim talk about the sales drama over Ghost of Tsushima and Days Gone, watch a new Horizon Forbidden West trailer, and go to the rumor mill!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - Housekeeping
7 on 7 TOMORROW!
New Merch up now!
My return to the Kinda Funny Podcast is up!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Pranksy
The Roper Report  -
00:09:04 - Yesterday, we talked about Ghost of Tsushima doing 8m, QT: Days Gone ALSO sold 8 million, Jeff Ross, Days Gone Game Director on Twitter
https://twitter.com/JakeRocket/status/1478878095570579456
00:30:30 - Ad
00:33:45 - We got a new Horizon Forbidden West Trailer; let’s watch!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K-6je9T8_aA
00:37:55 - Celebrate the 35th Anniversary of Castlevania with NFTs!, Danielle Partis @ GIB
https://www.konami.com/games/memorial-nft/en/
https://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/2022-01-06-konami-unveils-35th-castlevania-anniversary-nft-collection
00:40:35 - Activision SPEAKS on the Raven Software Strike, Marie Dealessandri @ GIB
https://www.gamesindustry.biz/articles/2022-01-05-raven-software-strike-continues-as-staff-report-no-response-from-activision-management
00:43:07 - RUMOR HAS IT!
00:51:40 - Out today
00:55:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tam and Tim
